item.title: About Me
item.description: I am currently a cryptographer at Semiotic Labs primarily working as a core dev. on The Graph protocol and am very excited about the new interactions unlocked by web3. I am interested in all things cryptography, from theory to practice: zkSNARKs, fhe, mpc, pqc, … side-channel attacks. I can do some math (but don’t consider myself a mathematician) and can do some coding and can play around with hardware. Before helping to build web3, I was a senior prinicipal anti-tamper systems engineer at Northrop Grumman Corp.
